replaceblockmeta.tooltip: The block meta to replace. Use -1 for the block's default state.
replacewith.tooltip: The block id to replace the block with.
replacewithmeta.tooltip: The block meta for the replacement block. Use -1 for the block's default state.
riskyblocks.tooltip: Enables using blocks that might crash/lag the game if used to replace another block. Enable at your own risk.
dimension_list.tooltip: This is the Dimension Black/Whitelist. If it contains *, it is a blacklist. Otherwise, it is a whitelist.
replacepercent.tooltip: What percentage of blocks get replaced
multiplychance.tooltip: Multiplies the block removal chance by the block's y-value.
wgbr.blockmeta_out_of_range: The block meta (%s) is out of the standard range.
wgbr.disallowed_block: WorldGen Block Replacer is configured not to use risky blocks, but you have specified a risky block to be used (%s).
wgbr.improperly_configured: WorldGen Block Replacer is improperly configured. Replacements will not happen until it is corrected.
wgbr.shutdown: WorldGen Block Replacer is improperly configured, shutting down. %s
